Hi, I'm Tim.

I'm a web developer living in Atlanta, GA with my wife and dog. I've been developing web sites and applications for the past 12 years. I have had the privilege to work with large and small shops and even a few startups. I also co-founded two companies, Argyll Studios and Hosted Notes. The latter was successfully acquired in 2013. I had the privilege to build the front end of the Barley Editor and the app Unmark.

Currently I'm a Front End (JavaScript) instructor at The Iron Yard

Tim Whitacre
